players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Observing the game, I haven't seen any suspicious behavior from Diana yet."
Bob: "Considering Charlie's death, let's be cautious. Diana seemed suspicious earlier."
Bob: "I'm not sure about Diana's motives, but let's keep an eye on her. We need to stay vigilant."
You: "I will continue to observe Diana closely. Let's all stay alert and discuss any new information we gather."
Diana: "I will continue to investigate Diana and keep an eye on her. Let's all stay vigilant and discuss any new information we gather."
